name: ChatDefense
description:
Hi, I'm an OfflineTV fan and decided to made this game during summer. It is based off twitch chat and their emote spams while the streamers defend against it! All enemy images, streamer emotes, and OfflineTV logo are not mine but all other art, programming, and music assets are created by me. I may add another map or tower at some point but i hope you all enjoy the game so far!

-TheRopeTosser

Instagram and Youtube @theropetosser
